languages.text: "У меня для тебя предложение. Теперь, когда загадка из буклета разгадана — не хочешь ли ты стать моим придворным специалистом по архитектуре? Летая со мной на корабле, ты сможешь увидеть десятки миров!"

"I have an offer for you. Now that the puzzle from the booklet has been solved, how would you like to become my resident expert on all matters architectural? You could see dozens of worlds travelling aboard my ship!"
languages.original_text: "У меня для тебя предложение. Теперь, когда загадка из буклета разгадана — не хочешь ли ты стать моим придворным специалистом по архитектуре? Летая со мной на корабле, ты сможешь увидеть десятки миров!"

traits.locale_text: "I have an offer for you. Now that the puzzle from the booklet has been solved, how would you like to become my court expert on architecture? You could see dozens of worlds travelling aboard my ship!"

"I have an offer for you. Now that the puzzle from the booklet has been solved, how would you like to become my court expert on architecture? You could see dozens of worlds travelling aboard my ship!"

"I have an offer for you. Now that the puzzle from the booklet has been solved, how would you like to become my resident expert on all matters architectural? You could see dozens of worlds travelling aboard my ship!"

"I have an offer for you. Now that the puzzle from the booklet has been solved, how would you like to become my resident expert on all matters architectural? You could see dozens of worlds travelling aboard my ship!"

languages.text: 「提案がある。小冊子の謎が解けた今、建築に関するあらゆる事柄について、{mf|俺|私}専属の専門家になるのはどうだろうか？{mf|俺|私}の船に乗れば、何十もの惑星を旅することができる！」
languages.original_text: "I have an offer for you. Now that the puzzle from the booklet has been solved, how would you like to become my resident expert on all matters architectural? You could see dozens of worlds travelling aboard my ship!"

traits.locale_text: 「提案がある。小冊子の謎が解けた今、建築に関するあらゆる事柄について、{mf|俺|私}専属の専門家になるのはどうだろうか？{mf|俺|私}の船に乗れば、何十もの惑星を旅することができる！」

languages.text: “我有个提议：既然我们已经解决了小册子上的谜题，那你愿意成为我的驻船建筑专家吗？你可以跟着我的船一起旅行，亲眼见证无数世界！”
languages.original_text: "I have an offer for you. Now that the puzzle from the booklet has been solved, how would you like to become my resident expert on all matters architectural? You could see dozens of worlds travelling aboard my ship!"

traits.locale_text: “我有个提议：既然我们已经解决了小册子上的谜题，那你愿意成为我的驻船建筑专家吗？你可以跟着我的船一起旅行，亲眼见证无数世界！”

languages.text: «Quiero proponerle algo. Ahora que hemos resuelto el acertijo del libreto, ¿le gustaría ser mi experto de confianza para todo lo que tenga que ver con la arquitectura? ¡Vería infinidad de mundos a bordo de mi nave!».
languages.original_text: "I have an offer for you. Now that the puzzle from the booklet has been solved, how would you like to become my resident expert on all matters architectural? You could see dozens of worlds travelling aboard my ship!"

traits.locale_text: «Quiero proponerle algo. Ahora que hemos resuelto el acertijo del libreto, ¿le gustaría ser mi experto de confianza para todo lo que tenga que ver con la arquitectura? ¡Vería infinidad de mundos a bordo de mi nave!».

languages.text: « J'ai une proposition à vous faire. Maintenant que l'énigme de l'opuscule est résolue, cela vous intéresserait-il de devenir mon expert en architecture ? Vous pourriez découvrir des dizaines de mondes en voyageant à bord de mon vaisseau ! »
languages.original_text: "I have an offer for you. Now that the puzzle from the booklet has been solved, how would you like to become my resident expert on all matters architectural? You could see dozens of worlds travelling aboard my ship!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai une proposition à vous faire. Maintenant que l'énigme de l'opuscule est résolue, cela vous intéresserait-il de devenir mon expert en architecture ? Vous pourriez découvrir des dizaines de mondes en voyageant à bord de mon vaisseau ! »

languages.text: "Ich habe ein Angebot für Euch. Das Rätsel aus dem Büchlein ist gelöst, da könntet Ihr doch mein Experte für alle Fragen in Sachen Architektur werden? Ihr würdet an Bord meines Schiffes mitreisen und Dutzende von Welten sehen!"
languages.original_text: "I have an offer for you. Now that the puzzle from the booklet has been solved, how would you like to become my resident expert on all matters architectural? You could see dozens of worlds travelling aboard my ship!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe ein Angebot für Euch. Das Rätsel aus dem Büchlein ist gelöst, da könntet Ihr doch mein Experte für alle Fragen in Sachen Architektur werden? Ihr würdet an Bord meines Schiffes mitreisen und Dutzende von Welten sehen!"

languages.text: "Sana bir teklifim var. Madem kitapçıktaki bulmacayı çözdük, o hâlde gemimin mimari konulardaki bilirkişisi olmaya ne dersin? Bizimle seyahat ederken onlarca farklı dünya görebilirsin!"
languages.original_text: "I have an offer for you. Now that the puzzle from the booklet has been solved, how would you like to become my resident expert on all matters architectural? You could see dozens of worlds travelling aboard my ship!"

traits.locale_text: "Sana bir teklifim var. Madem kitapçıktaki bulmacayı çözdük, o hâlde gemimde mimarlıkla ilgili meselelerin bilirkişisi olmak ister misin? Gemimde seyahat ederken onlarca dünyayı görebilirsin!"
